channel.title: Multi-Activity on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content in Multi-Activity on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India

item.title: Walkers Tour of Meghalaya
item.description: This particular Multi-activity tour takes us on bicycles and on foot across the Khasi and Jaintia Hills of Meghalaya.

item.title: Hike, Bike & Raft in Eastern Arunachal Pradesh
item.description: This multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh takes us on bicycles, rafts and on foot across the watershed area of the Brahmaputra River valley.
